body_html: If I understand @WI-KIWI may be asking if you can apply a binary masking matrix or vector to some parameters at each step. I am also interested in functionality that would allow me to pass either a list of indices to zero out weights or a list of indices to keep active at each step.

body: If I understand @WI-KIWI may be asking if you can apply a binary masking matrix or vector to some parameters at each step. I am also interested in functionality that would allow me to pass either a list of indices to zero out weights or a list of indices to keep active at each step.
